Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: News media report that people are putting pressure on the Australian government to increase JobSeeker payments as the cost of living is taking a toll on job seekers. But not everyone's on board as there are concerns about the financial impact of the recommendations. Meanwhile the search for missing Brisbane woman Lesley Trotter continues which has led to a harrowing operation to find her body. Lastly a group of fishermen was recently rescued after being stranded for days off the coast of Western Australia.
